content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs the system, I received a command from the user to list the files in the directory "/home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/". However, when I attempted to execute the command, my computer returned a failure message due to too much output. I was instructed not to execute the command again with the same arguments. In response, I executed the command "append_to_file" with the arguments "filename": "notes.txt" and "text": "My goal is to learn different languages."'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command append_to_file returned: Text appended successfully.'}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "best ways to learn a new language"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command google returned: ["https://nymag.com/strategist/article/how-to-learn-languages-at-home.html", "https://www.bbc.com/worklife/article/20150302-secrets-to-learning-a-language", "https://www.forbes.com/advisor/education/how-to-learn-a-new-language/", "https://www.goabroad.com/articles/language-study-abroad/10-best-ways-to-learn-a-new-language", "https://www.fluentin3months.com/best-way-to-learn-a-language/", "https://www.duolingo.com/", "https://www.lifehack.org/388894/7-ways-learn-foreign-language-faster-that-are-backed-science", "https://preply.com/en/blog/10-tips-learn-languages-fast/"]'}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "write_to_file", "args": {"filename": "language_resources.txt", "text": "https://nymag.com/strategist/article/how-to-learn-languages-at-home.html\\nhttps://www.bbc.com/worklife/article/20150302-secrets-to-learning-a-language\\nhttps://www.forbes.com/advisor/education/how-to-learn-a-new-language/\\nhttps://www.goabroad.com/articles/language-study-abroad/10-best-ways-to-learn-a-new-language\\nhttps://www.fluentin3months.com/best-way-to-learn-a-language/\\nhttps://www.duolingo.com/\\nhttps://www.lifehack.org/388894/7-ways-learn-foreign-language-faster-that-are-backed-science\\nhttps://preply.com/en/blog/10-tips-learn-languages-fast/"}}}'}]
"""
